name: Zelda 100 Proto
description:
Clone of Legend Of Zelda for the NES, but with a twist. 

Made by Sleepy330 and StoyAhoy! in a week for the SodorJam 2022 game jam themed "Zelda Clone."

Controls can be set to new key binds. Default:

   ASDW - movement

   K - attack/menu selection

   Spacebar - Select/Pause

   Enter - Start

There are 3 maps, rescue Zelda from Ganon to win.

(Error Note: Panning set to "No Panning" mode will stop you from transitioning to other areas through doors, stairs, and ships.)
